name: Cursor Curse
description:
Oh no! Your soul has left your body, and is being controlled by your cursor! Move your mouse around the level to interact with objects, as well as JOIN TOGETHER with your body again to gain back your movement.

Made within 48 hours for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam.

CONTROLS:
A/D - Left/Right
Space - Jump
Mouse - Interact
Enter - Restart Level
Escape - Exit Game
